## Project Overview

This project focuses on Click-Through Rate (CTR) prediction for recommendation systems, exploring the integration of deep learning models with Large Language Models.

### Objectives

- Implement DeepFM models for CTR prediction
- Integrate LLM embeddings into recommendation systems
- Evaluate hybrid architectures on real-world datasets

### Architecture Overview

![Hybrid recommendation system architecture](images/profile/architecture-diagram.png){fig-align="center" width=700px style="border-radius: 8px; border: 2px solid #ddd;"}

### Methodology

We use the FuxiCTR framework with the Avazu dataset to train and evaluate our models. The approach combines:

1. Neural embedding layers for categorical features
2. Deep learning architectures (DeepFM)
3. LLM-based feature enhancement
